Plot: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom?
Title: King of Devil's Island
Writer: Mette M. Bølstad (story), Lars Saabye Christensen (story), Dennis Magnusson (screenplay), Eric Schmid (screenplay)
Actors: Benjamin Helstad, Trond Nilssen, Stellan Skarsgård, Kristoffer Joner
tomatoConsensus: Scandinavian in the most bleakly satisfying way, King of Devil's Island satisfies with a richly layered narrative and a typically strong performance from Stellan Skarsgard.
